mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(cart_no),0)+1 cartNo from cart
insert into cart values (#{cartNo}, #{email}, #{productDetailNo}, 1)
mapper.select: select c.*, pp.product_photo, p.product_name, p.price, pd.product_size, pd.color from cart c, product p, product_photo pp, product_detail pd where c.email=#{email} and c.product_detail_no = pd.product_detail_no and p.product_no = pd.product_no and p.product_no = pp.product_no and pp.batch = 1 order by cart_no desc
